name: Smutty Scrolls
description:
Heyho, you funky sexy slime adventurer!

Welcome to a mindbending erotic drag 'n drop puzzle adventure where you play three versions of yourself at the same time! Multi-dimensional, booby, brainy goodness for adults!



Brave slime Lim-Lim faces countless sexy adventures in mysterious fantasy worlds!
Let the Smutty Scrolls tell you his naughty tales... and especially the countless lewd endings!

Wishlist Smutty Scrolls now! You sexy little slime, you... :)
